page.title: 17THE PROBLEM OF LONELINESS
page.content: Though many people think of seaside towns are very lively places there is a great problem in our area of people being lonely. In the whole of the Brighton area l8,OOO people live alone. Especially in the Kemptown and Queen's Park areas there are many small flats & bedsitters. Many old people who live there are afraid of vandalism and of going out alone at night. The local director of Age Concern said "Pensioners leave family and friends to retire to the coast.But when one partner dies,the other is left alone for good." Our survey found that there is a lack of facilities for such people and not enough day centres. Our school visits old people but there is a lot to be done and the problem is growing.
